name: David Alfonso
description: I am a software developer, currently focusing on web development. I enjoy front-end development as well as the back-end. I am looking to get more practice and experience in the world of development. I hope to also learn new technologies to add to my stack. I created this portfolio with React to showcase some of my abilities. You can find the repo for this website in my GitHub page.
skills: I am able to develop front-ends using HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript/TypeScript and frameworks such as React and Bootstrap.
Familiar with back-end technologies such as NodeJs, C++, C# and Java.
Capable of working in agile methodologies such as Kanban and SCRUM.

experience.description: I worked for Capital One’s dispute department where our customers called for assistance with different types of financial and payment issues. Since Capital One is a bank, I was trusted to handle very sensitive information that will help me provide support to our customers.

At Tek Experts I work as technical support engineer providing support for Azure from Microsoft. Here I’ve had to work with other engineers from various companies to solve issues with web services. Many times I have had to work in high severity cases where a customer’s product is about to go into production or is already in production and the issue needs to be solved as quickly as possible.
